EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #1.2019 Dealer Update #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - ADS-B Out Promotion for All Dealers & Installers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | November 2018
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-855​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides 2019 pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-855 radio suites. - Consistent with a similar bulletin released in October, promotional pricing is available to all Honeywell dealers and installers. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-01 Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-855.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-850​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides 2019 pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-850 radio suites. - Consistent with a similar bulletin released in October, promotional pricing is available to all Honeywell dealers and installers. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-02 Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-850.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
